ich

you   whether it's a prime. And then I give you a number

8725e665-7fd8-4be5-87f5-080e8727ce76.chunk:
ill take 10 times the effort to   check whether a four-digit number is a prime

t do this according 
to the magnitude, but according to the number of   digits. So, if I add two numbers like this, then

will say 9 plus 3 is 12, carry the 1

a6c478f6-dec7-4333-9ff0-540d534e4086.title: Analysis of Algorithms
a6c478f6-dec7-4333-9ff0-540d534e4086.chunk:
then I will   say this is 11, carry the one and I will get

So,

5c1ffa9c-eb7e-4f79-ba6e-8d05c245bb46.title: Analysis of Algorithms
5c1ffa9c-eb7e-4f79-ba6e-8d05c245bb46.chunk:
it did not take me again 10 times the work,   to go from adding two-digit numbers to adding

a4b8f2ce-e2fe-4d4f-9c36-21457fd7df70.title: Analysis of Algorithms

ything that you do,

to the logarithmic logarithm of the

29152e32-9511-4df4-8092-cdea1f2876c8.chunk:
